title: Langlang Shan Xiao Yaoguai
synopsis:
Can one embark on a journey to the West without extraordinary abilities? A little pig demon decides to leave Langlang Mountain and team up with a toad demon, a weasel demon, and a gorilla monster to complete their pilgrimage. What trials will the little demons encounter on their westward journey? Will they ultimately be able to achieve their wishes and live the lives they desire?

(Source: Bilibili, translated)
